What schools did Mason Plumlee attend?

Mason Plumlee attended Warsaw Community in Warsaw, Indiana, Christ School in Arden, North Carolina and Duke.

What are Mason Plumlee's nicknames?

Plumdog Millionaire, Plums are nicknames for Mason Plumlee.
